name: Snake.io Run - Hunt Other Color Worm Balls
name_original: Snake.io Run - Hunt Other Color Worm Balls
description: Snake run is a playful, challenging and stand-alone casual battle game. The Greedy snake will eat any preys in order to become the biggest snake in the game. Be careful that when you eat smaller snakes, the bigger snakes will also want to eat you. When meeting a  bigger snake , the smaller snake needn’t to worry about it so mush, because smaller snake has a faster speed  and it is able to eat little balls on the way to become bigger.
